head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRESNICK, JEANNE ABERMAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRESNICK, JEANNE ABERMAN

block.p: BRESNICK - Jeanne Aberman, died August 4, 2000 at age 94. Much loved mother of Barbara, Paul, and Gail Goldman, Grandmother of Laurie, Emily, Rabinder, Lewis and Polly. New York Interior Decorator, good friend, generous heart, great lady who will be very much missed. Memorial service Beth Moses Cemetery, Pinelawn L.I., Sunday, August 6, 2000. Donations may be made to Christian Life Center, 2699 W.Commercial Blvd., Ft. Lauderdale, FL, in honor of Sharon Taylor, devoted caregiver.
